ComicInfo.Summary: Prime finds himself stranded in another dimensional New York and fights a gamma spawned monster created by Wildeman. When he tries to stop the mad doctor from abducting a young girl, the Hulk misunderstands and intervenes.
ComicInfo.Writer: Gerard Jones,Len Strazewski,Peter David,Len Strazewski,Gerard Jones,Peter David
ComicInfo.Title: Monsters of Manhattan Part I; Monsters of Manhattan Part II
